greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of set partitions of [n] such that the difference between each element and its index (in the partition) is a multiple of k; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..34, flattened
maple: b:= proc(l, k, i, t) option remember; `if`(l=[], 1, add(`if`(l[j]=t,
b(subsop(j=[][], l), k, j, irem(1+t, k)), 0), j=[1, $i..nops(l)]))
mathematica: b[l_, k_, i_, t_] := b[l, k, i, t] = If[l == {}, 1, Sum[If[l[[j]] == t, b[ReplacePart[l, j -> Nothing], k, j, Mod[1+t, k]], 0], {j, Prepend[ Range[i, Length[l]], 1]}]]; A[n_, k_] := If[n==0, 1, If[k==0, 2^(n-1), b[Flatten[Table[Mod[i, k], {i, 2, n}]], k, 1, Mod[2, k]]]]; Table[A[n, d - n], {d, 0, 15}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 02 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 09 2016
